legacy.full_text: @AmbCuiTiankai is a veteran diplomat w/ keen acumen to navigate waters amid heightened US-China tensions. @MerthaAndrew of @SAISHopkins said Cui "understands the different political realities in both countries & is able to navigate them extremely well". https://t.co/RrGCvrnhHE
As a member of press corps in DC, I enjoyed talking w/ @AmbCuiTiankai, who's never shied away from tough questions. China needs more envoys of such caliber and capacity.

legacy.full_text: Making a #COVID19 vaccine a global public product will help the world recover faster & suffer less,  @WHO chief @DrTedros said at a virtual @AspenSecurity forum Aug. 6. He said, “We want political leaders to decide on this: #vaccine nationalism is not good. It will not help us."

legacy.full_text: The China-US relationship can have a future only when it is built on dialogue & cooperation, and countries should be each other’s partners, not imaginary enemies, @AmbCuiTiankai said as the two countries are experiencing sharp deterioration in relations. https://t.co/JaTwsNMcqe

legacy.description: Chief Washington Correspondent of China Daily;  Alfred Friendly Program Fellow at Denver Rocky Mountain News in 2001. RTs ≠ endorsements. Opinions are my own.
legacy.name: Huanxin Zhao

legacy.full_text: Countries have to base their policies on a good perception of the common interests, on growing global challenges & how the int'l community would expect them to do, & not allow suspicion, fear, or hatred to hijack their foreign policy. @AmbCuiTiankai told @FareedZakaria Saturday.
